## Data Import

### Import water point data

```{r}
#| eval: false
wp<- st_read(dsn="Take home 2 data",
             layer="geo_export",
             crs=4326) %>%
  filter(clean_coun=="Nigeria")
```

```{r}
wp_nga<-write_rds(wp,"Take home 2 data/wp_nga.rds")
```

```{r}
wp_nga$Geometry = st_as_sfc(wp_nga$`New Georeferenced Column`)
```
